TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ApplicationAccessControlAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ApplicationAccessControlAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ApplicationAccessControlAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指定對包含 類別之組件的存取控制 (Access Control)。

span.span: Specifies access controls to an assembly containing classes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在.NET Framework 1.1 版中，如果這個屬性不存在的組件，COM + 安全性設定預設會啟用。In .NET Framework version 1.1, if this attribute is not present in the assembly, the COM+ security configuration is enabled by default. 這是.NET Framework 1.0 版的行為變更。This is a change in behavior from .NET Framework version 1.0. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個屬性來控制存取權包含的組件類別。The following code example demonstrates the use of this attribute to control access to an assembly containing classes. [!code-cpp[EnterpriseServices_Security#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Security/CPP/employeeinformation.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[EnterpriseServices_Security#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Security/CS/employeeinformation.cs#2)] [!code-vb[EnterpriseServices_Security#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServices_Security/VB/employeeinformation.vb#2)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 啟用 COM+ 安全性組態，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, enabling the COM+ security configuration.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個屬性來控制存取權包含的組件類別。The following code example demonstrates the use of this attribute to control access to an assembly containing classes. summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，並設定 屬性以指示是否啟用 COM 安全性組態。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class and sets the property indicating whether to enable COM security configuration.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::EnterpriseServices::AccessChecksLevelOption AccessChecksLevel { System::EnterpriseServices::AccessChecksLevelOption get(); void set(System::EnterpriseServices::AccessChecksLevelOption value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定處理序層級或元件層級的存取檢查層級。

span.span: Gets or sets the access checking level to process level or to component level.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 僅限 Windows 2000 和更新版本支援此屬性。This property is supported only on Windows 2000 and later. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個屬性。The following code example demonstrates the use of this property. span.span: Gets or sets the remote procedure call (RPC) authentication level.

span.span: Gets or sets the impersonation level that is allowed for calling targets of this application.
